trans-unit.source:
Dear %userFirstName%,

Your application to the company %companyName% for the position: %jobTitle% is still pending. Our recruiters will review it and contact you to discuss further proceedings or should any questions arise.

Good luck with your application.

Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team
trans-unit.target:
Kære %firstName% %lastName%,

din ansøgning til job: "%jobTitle%" afventer stadig svar.

Venlig Hilsen,

Matchico teamet
